page.title: 11A Llandudno Headteacher.
page.content: { Robert John Thomas. Mr. Robert John Thomas was born in Llandudno in 1922. His father was a farmer and part-owner of a quarry on Nant-y-Gamar Hill. He attended Craig-y -Don Primary School and John Bright Grammar School, where he studied Science. He left school to join the Royal Air Force in 1941 and served there until 1946 as a pilot and flying instructor. After demobilisation he attended Bangor Normal College as a student teacher. After qualifying he taught at Dolgarrog, Craig-y-Don, Llangelynin and Great Orme Primary Schools. He has been headteacher at Dyffryn Road School since 1971. When he retires this summer he will have more time with his family of one bro- ther, wife, two children and four grandchildren, as well as playing golf and gardening.
